content: {"name": "City of Refuge Baltimore", "alternate_name": "", "description": "Lineup at 7am to receive ticket outside of building, serves first 100 people", "email": "", "url": "https://www.cityofrefugebaltimore.org/", "status": "active", "address": {"address_1": "3501 7th Street", "address_2": null, "city": "Brooklyn", "state_province": "MD", "postal_code": "21225", "country": "US"}, "location": {"latitude": 39.2335295, "longitude": -76.59827279999999}, "phones": [{"number": "(410) 355-6707", "type": "voice"}], "regular_schedule": [{"weekday": "Tuesday", "opens_at": "14:00", "closes_at": "17:00"}, {"weekday": "Monday", "opens_at": "11:00", "closes_at": ""}, {"weekday": "Wednesday", "opens_at": "11:00", "closes_at": ""}, {"weekday": "Thursday", "opens_at": "11:00", "closes_at": ""}], "service_attributes": [{"attribute_key": "INFO", "attribute_value": "No requirements"}, {"attribute_key": "REQUIREMENT", "attribute_value": "ID required"}, {"attribute_key": "INFO", "attribute_value": "Closed During Year: Inclement weather"}, {"attribute_key": "INFO", "attribute_value": "Client can visit: twice a month"}, {"attribute_key": "OFFERING", "attribute_value": "Offers job training/assistance"}, {"attribute_key": "REQUIREMENT", "attribute_value": "Get a number/ticket"}, {"attribute_key": "INFO", "attribute_value": "Closed on major holidays"}, {"attribute_key": "OFFERING", "attribute_value": "Rental assistance"}, {"attribute_key": "OFFERING", "attribute_value": "Housing assistance"}, {"attribute_key": "REQUIREMENT", "attribute_value": "Registration required on site"}]}
